commits.author: Uwe Schindler
commits.sourceNew: /** * Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is found, reads the term values * in field and returns a {@link DocTermOrds} instance, providing a method to retrieve * the terms (as ords) per document. * * @param reader Used to build a {@link DocTermOrds} instance * @param field Which field contains the strings. * @return a {@link DocTermOrds} instance * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public DocTermOrds getDocTermOrds(AtomicIndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld: /** * Checks the internal cache for an appropriate entry, and if none is found, reads the term values * in field and returns a {@link DocTermOrds} instance, providing a method to retrieve * the terms (as ords) per document. * * @param reader Used to build a {@link DocTermOrds} instance * @param field Which field contains the strings. * @return a {@link DocTermOrds} instance * @throws IOException If any error occurs. */ public DocTermOrds getDocTermOrds(IndexReader reader, String field) throws IOException;

commits.author: Uwe Schindler
